fields.name: Action
fields.description: Action needs to be taken on rule execution.

fields.name: AutoMitigate
fields.description: The flag that indicates whether the alert should be automatically resolved or not. The default is false.

fields.name: CreatedWithApiVersion
fields.description: The api-version used when creating this alert rule

fields.name: Description
fields.description: The description of the Log Search rule.

fields.name: DisplayName
fields.description: The display name of the alert rule

fields.name: Enabled
fields.description: The flag which indicates whether the Log Search rule is enabled. Value should be true or false

fields.name: IsLegacyLogAnalyticsRule
fields.description: True if alert rule is legacy Log Analytic rule

fields.name: LastUpdatedTime
fields.description: Last time the rule was updated in IS08601 format.

fields.name: ProvisioningState
fields.description: Provisioning state of the scheduled query rule

fields.name: Schedule
fields.description: Schedule (Frequency, Time Window) for rule. Required for action type - AlertingAction

fields.name: Source
fields.description: Data Source against which rule will Query Data
